jobDescription: General: AKF Analysis & Testing is currently  offering an opportunity for a vibration specialist to join our exciting client  oriented group within AKF. The majority of the responsibilities would  be going into the field operating a vibration analyzer, collecting  data, data review and producing a final report. We  are fast paced team visiting a multiple of different commercial and campus  facilities in a week.
